description: Coast Baobab is an initiative in Kenya's coastal region focused on promoting local snacks, particularly baobab products and kashata. By collaborating with various stakeholders, they enhance the availability and appeal of these traditional snacks, making them accessible throughout Kenya and beyond. The initiative aims to support food sustainability while addressing challenges in production and distribution, ultimately fostering a thriving market for these unique coastal delicacies.
name: Coast Baobab
